original_text: Now I want to say something to you who are leaders of the groups of believers. Like you, I am also a leader. I myself saw how people caused Christ to have great pain so that he died. One day people will see how great he really is. Then I will be among those people who join with him in heaven. So I say this to you who are leaders: Peter 4
korean_text: 너희 중 장로들에게 권하노니 나는 함께 장로 된 자요 그리스도의 고난의 증인이요 나타날 영광에 참여할 자니라

sentences.original_text: Now I want to say something to you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 나는 너희에게 무언가 말하고 싶다

sentences.original_text: who are leaders of the groups of believers
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 믿는 사람들의 그룹을 이끄는 지도자들이다

sentences.original_text: Like you, I am also a leader
I myself saw how people caused Christ to have great pain
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사람들이 그리스도에게 큰 고통을 주는 것을 직접 보았다

sentences.original_text: One day people will see how great he really is
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 사람들은 그가 얼마나 위대한지 알게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then I will be among those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 나는 그 사람들 중에 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: who join with him in heaven
So I say this to you who are leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 너희 지도자들에게 이것을 말한다
